lesson_html:
• Greetings: Start with a friendly "Hello!" or "Hi!" to make a good first impression.
  • Ask Questions: Use questions like "How are you?" to show interest in the other person.
  • Introduce Yourself: Say your name clearly, for example, "My name is [Your Name]."
  • Respond: When someone introduces themselves, reply with "Nice to meet you!"
  • Body Language: Smile and maintain eye contact to show you are engaged.
